name: (Game Jam) Desert Digger
description:
The fox would like to lounge around on the sofa all day but he can't do that. There's work to do! Those metals and minerals won't harvest themselves.

Although the fox is fireproof, after playing this game you may find that you can never think of "Firefox" the same way again.

If you made a submission to the Palette Jam, leave some feedback and I'll leave feedback for your game if it's playable in the browser!

I'd like to thank my team for all the effort they put into this project. I couldn't have made this without them. Coder: Illedan, Graphics: Chris Mono, Audio: Lauren Pham

I'm looking for regular work! See my itch.io portfolio for more examples of what I can make and have made.
